body:
Ding,



Regarding 3, you need to use solveAdjacencies to get interior walls:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xqR4UJX5Ly8&index=5&list=PL...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xqR4UJX5Ly8&index=5&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_)



Also, make sure that you are following the rules of geometry for adjacent zones that I outline here:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDvBWDA0aF0&index=10&list=P...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDvBWDA0aF0&index=10&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_)



-Chris
